definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: hew, hew out, cleave (NH id., Aram. [[חֲחַב]]; SI:4. 6 pt. pl. [[החחבם]]; cf. Ph. [[מחחב]] = Heb. id.)—

hew out, (dig), wine-vat [[יֶקֶב]] Is 5:2; sepulchre ([[קֶבֶר]]) Is 22:16, Is 22:16; cisterns [[בּׂרוֹת]] De 6:11, De 6:11, 2Ch 26:10, Ne 9:25, cf. Je 2:13; of mining [[נחשׁת]] ´[[מהרריה תַּת]] De 8:9 out of its mountains thou mayst hew out copper.

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: hew stone 1Ch 22:2; metaph. of pillars Pr 9:1 (subj. wisdom); elsewhere pt., hewer of stone 2Ki 12:13, 1Ch 22:2, 1Ch 22:15 (v. SI:4.6 supr.); prob. 1Ki 5:29, 2Ch 2:1, 2Ch 2:17 ([[בָּהָר]]´[[ח]] v. Be), cf. 2Ch 24:12, Ezr 3:7.

metaph. hew in pieces Ho 6:5 fig. of ´[[י]] attacking people by agency of prophets (‖[[הֲרַגְתִּים]]); divide, cleave subj. ´[[י]]'s voice Ps 29:7 obj. [[להבות אשׁ]], i.e. the thunder of his voice sends forked lightnings (but on txt. cf. Che and crit. n.)

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יֵחָחְבוּן]] be cut, hewn, graven (words on rock) Job 19:24.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. [[חֻצַּבְתֶּם]] Is 51:1 fig., hewn out of rock (of Isr.'s origin; ‖[[נֻקַּר]]).
